title: Championship Sunday preview
itunes:title: Championship Sunday preview
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling, and Gregg Rosenthal – discuss all the latest news from around the NFL, including Chip Kelly’s first press conference as the 49ers head coach, and the Chargers filing for a franchise trademark in L.A. Then, the heroes turn their sights to Championship Sunday to preview what’s in store for the final four teams as they battle it out for an appearance at Super Bowl 50. Plus, a special Championship Sunday edition of “Go Get My Lunch!”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
